website_summaries.verdict: A waterproof lighter that is expertly crafted from high-end materials and will continue to perform up to 15,000 strikes.
pros: Comes with a waterproof canister to protect fuel and ensure long-lasting durability
Offers a built-in O-ring that helps prevent fuel vaporization
Long-lasting wick guarantees the lighter can serve you well for years to come
cons: Replacing the flint sometimes can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality little kit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality little kit. the lighters are keychain size and seem to hold their fuel pretty well thanks to the O ring sealing on the cap. the lighter fluid bottle has a rubber seal on the main body as well as the internal cap. everything is acceptable fit wise and the little lighters spark up well and put out a good size flame; they are not wind proof by any means. The keychain lighter fluid container works to fill standard zippo style lighters.
customer_reviews.author: Isak

customer_reviews.title: Nice lighter. Be very careful with flint replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lighter. Does everything it advertises. Be aware the flint is held in place by a machine screw that is not attached to the flint spring as I have seen on other, regular lighters. When replacing the flint, the screw "pops off" and may easily be lost. Reinstalling the flint & spring may be a challenge for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little lighters, but use the clip, NOT the chain to mount them.
customer_reviews.text: I like these tiny little lighters! They are very cool. HOWEVER.. The chain that comes attached to it is garbage. I highly recommend using the included clip to make sure you dont lose it. I gifted one that was lost and mine fell off of my key ring yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, great price. Lighters are tiny and can be added to emergency kits. Will use the other one for pills or other supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: light
customer_reviews.text: holds fuel longer than i thought it would provides emergency fire
customer_reviews.author: frostgraywolf

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Invaluable on a keychain. I don't even smoke, but fire at your fingertips is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: For price can't beat, keeping fuel well so far
customer_reviews.text: For price can't beat, keeping fuel well so far. Would recommend for camping or spare in case of need
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: A waterproof lighter that you can start a fire with. You won't start that many fires with but you will always a real fire starting device, not a sparker, but a real lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have for emergencies, or camping, or just spares.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool little lighter and better Quality then I expected I will be getting more for friends
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel flinn

customer_reviews.title: ehh ok
customer_reviews.text: this is okay, didn't work exactly like it was supposed to. The fuel evaporates quickly but great conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pix

product_meta.title: EDC Waterproof keychain Lighter - 2 Pack Peanut Lighter for Survival and Emergency Use Bonus Inculded 6 Lighter flint & 1 Windproof wick
